channel.title: 317 noclip help! Urgent
channel.description:
When I click on a monster ( Rock Crab , Goblin , ect.. ) to attack it , it runs through anything ( Walls , doors , ect.. ) to attack that monster. Example : The rock crab is on the other side of the door and when I click the rock crab my character walks throught the door then attacks the rock crab
Please help :( had this problem for a long time
sorry for the bad english

item.title: 317 noclip help! Urgent

item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

This problem has been answered, but I can’t post the site here.
Just go to Google and search 317 NPC Clipping and you’ll find the website.
